items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Agrstar Women's 3/4 Sleeve Overtop
items.body: Soft, stylish, brightly colored, quality and appropriate size. Love these so I bought a three so far: light blue, orange and peach. They are light weight so a long sleeve printed top underneath and this overtop can make an outfit pop! I love how the cut is longer in the back to cover up the tush. Just very pretty. These are also great for spring, fall and those summer evenings or chilly restaurants when you need to cover the arms to block the chill. The material is soft. I wash on a gentle wash with light colors and hang dry because I prefer not to put my clothes in the dryer. I highly recommend these overtops! Read more
items.author: ITSatWork4U

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, fits well
items.body: This is super cute not cheaply made, but not very heavy. It feels very feminine and hangs really well. I checked the sizing chart, you should always do that, so this was true to size for me Read more
items.author: Debbie Sammons

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for spring, summer, fall
items.body: Like it but it wrinkles easy, lightweight, looks really good and very soft. Read more
items.author: Betty B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice. Helps pull an outfit together. I like the ruffle!
items.body: I like these lightweight jackets a lot. They are soft and stretchy and a good value. I love the ruffle around the bottom. The black goes with everything and the leopard is really fun! The lavender was not.a great color for me. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars could be better quality
items.body: the fit is okay, a smidge too small but still wearable..i'm not a fan of the fabric though, it seems like its not the best quality. Hopefully it proves me wrong. Read more
items.author: AArgy78

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product.
items.body: Very comfortable, quality is great, works well with any style, light weight material, and fits great. Love the material. Would definitely buy this again and would recommend. Read more
items.author: Lawrence Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite cardigan
items.body: I have repurchased this cardigan in multiple colors because of how much I like it. It is a thin cardigan which is what I wanted to have at work in case I got a little bit cold. The style is really cute in my opinion and it fits very true to size. Read more
items.author: Brayden Stull

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles!
items.body: Cute enough, but low quality even for the price. Like too many of these off brand items, it's an extremely thin rayon ("viscose") that also means it shrinks a lot (and already ran small!) gets damaged easily when washed and wrinkles way too much. Arrived vacuum packed and took extreme efforts to un wrinkle without damage. Sellers clearly aware this was a bad idea, as it comes with multiple suggestions on how to fix the issues the packaging caused. Then wrinkles immediately when you sit down or cross your arms. Read more
items.author: Jessica

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 3 Pack 3/4 Sleeve Cardigan for Women White, Black, Grey, Burnt Orange, Army Green, Sage Green, Black, Navy Blue, Camel Brown, Red, 3 Pack 3/4 Sleeve Cardigan for Women Purple, Dark Blue, Black, Lavender, Pink, White, 3 Pack 3/4 Sleeve Women's Cardigan Pink, Sage Green, Lavender, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
